channel.title: prawn on Maiche Jewan
channel.description: Recent content in prawn on Maiche Jewan

item.title: Prawn chilly fry
item.description: Ingredients: 1⁄2 kg. prawns, medium -sized, shelled and deveined 3 onions, medium, sliced 2 tomatoes, medium, sliced 4 green chillies, slit in half 1 tsp. ginger, chopped 2 tsp. garlic, chopped 1⁄2 tsp. red kashmir chilli powder 1⁄2 tsp. coriander powder 1⁄2 tsp. cumin powder 1⁄2 tsp garam masala powder 1⁄4 tsp turmeric powder 2 tbsp. lemon juice salt, to taste 3 tbsp, coriander leaves, chopped 15 green curry leaves 4 tbsp oil Method: Marinate prawns with red chilly and turmeric powder and 1 tablespoon of lemon juice.
